mapper.sql: id, project_code, project_name, project_type, schedule, create_time, creator, Modifier, update_time, delete_time, back_up1, back_up2, back_up3, back_up4, back_up5, back_up6, back_up7, back_up8, back_up9, back_up10,organization,project_money,project_stage,project_status
mapper.select:
select count(*) from project a
and a.project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and a.project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and a.organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and a.project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and a.creator like "%" #{creator} "%"
and a.schedule like "%" #{schedule} "%"

select * from project a
project_status like "%Ab1%"
and a.project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and a.project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and a.organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and a.project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and a.creator_name like "%" #{creatorName} "%"
and a.schedule like "%" #{schedule} "%"
limit #{rownum},#{pagecount}
select a.* ,b.schedule as AllSchedule,b.node from project a LEFT JOIN business_configuration b on a.project_type=b.project_type where a.id=#{id} and a.project_type=#{projectType}
select a.* ,b.schedule as AllSchedule,b.node from project a ,business_configuration b where a.id=#{id} and b.project_type=#{projectType}
